Package com.github.actionfx.core.beans

Class BeanWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.actionfx.core.beans.BeanWrapper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BindingModelProxy
    public class BeanWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper around a JavaBean to access its properties via convenience methods.
    Author:
    koster

      • getPropertyValue

        public <T> T getPropertyValue​(java.lang.String nestedPropertyPath)
        Retrieves a value described by a nested path nestedPropertyPath.

        In case the nestedPathProperty resolves to an instance of type ObservableValue, the property value and not the property itself is returned (because we do not do direct field access, but we use the corresponding getter-method. Getter-methods on properties return the value, not the property).

        In case you need access to the ObservableValue instance itself, please use method getFxProperty(String), which uses the property-getter and not the regular getter for retrieving the field instance.

        In case one of the path elements of the nested path evaluates to null, null is returned by this method.

        Parameters:
        nestedPropertyPath - a nested path to a property
        Returns:
        the instance that is the provider of the filed

      • getFxProperty

        public <T> javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyProperty<T> getFxProperty​(java.lang.String nestedPropertyPath)
        Retrieves a JavaFX property described by a nested path (nestedPropertyPath. The value is expected to be of type ReadOnlyProperty.

        This method uses the "property-getter" method for accessing the property (which is "propertyNameProperty()" for a property with name "propertyName").

        In case one of the path elements of the nested path evaluates to null, null is returned by this method.

        In case, there is no

        Parameters:
        nestedPropertyPath - a nested path to a property
        Returns:
        the instance that is the provider of the property

      • getBeanPropertyReference

        public <T> BeanPropertyReference<T> getBeanPropertyReference​(java.lang.String nestedPropertyPath)
        Retrieves a property reference described by a nested path nestedPropertyPath.

        In case one of the path elements of the nested path evaluates to null, null is returned by this method.

        Parameters:
        nestedPropertyPath - a nested path to a property
        Returns:
        the property
